description: Information about the distributor of and options for obtaining the resource.
title: distributor

___orderProcess.description: Provides information about how the resource may be obtained and related instructions and fee information.

$eref.description: Provides information about how the resource may be obtained and related instructions and fee information.
$eref.title: orderProcess

___plannedAvailability.description: Date and time when the resource will be available.

___turnaround.description: Typical turnaround time for the filling of an order.

FGDC CSDGM: distinfo > stdorder > digform > digtopt > onlinopt > accinstr

___orderingInstructions.description: General instructions, terms and services provided by the distributor.

___fees.description: Fees and terms for retrieving the resource, including monetary units.

___contactId.description: Identifier matching a contactId in the main contact array.

___organizationMembers.description: Identifies individuals that have an association with an organization contact.

___roleExtent.description: The area or period of time for which the role is valid.

___party.description: Identifies all the contacts associated with the role.

___role.description: Function performed by the contact in the current context.

___contact.description: Party from whom the resource may be obtained. Note: This list need not be exhaustive.

___transferOption.description: Describes method and media by which a resource is obtained from the distributor.

$eref.description: Describes method and media by which a resource is obtained from the distributor.
$eref.title: transferOption

___transferFrequency.description: The rate of occurrence of distribution.

___unitsOfDistribution.description: The tiles, layers, geographic areas, etc., in which data are available.

___distributionFormat.description: Provides information about the format used by the distributor.

___offlineOption.description: Information about obtaining the resource through off-line procedure.

___transferSize.description: Estimated size of a unit in the specified transfer format, expressed in megabytes.

___onlineOption.description: Information about obtaining the resource on-line.
